speaker.name: Andy Piper
speaker.biography: Developer Advocate. API tinkerer. Friendly DEV.to moderator & community helper. IoT hacker (Eclipse IoT / MQTT). Perpetual student. LEGO fan. Prefer they/them pronouns.
